commands: execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,sort=nearest,limit=1,distance=0..1.8] run scoreboard players operation @s satsu.iron.man.mask = @e[type=minecraft:player,sort=nearest,limit=1] satsu.iron.man.mask

execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,sort=nearest,limit=1,distance=0..1.8] run scoreboard players operation @s satsu.iron.man.armor = @e[type=minecraft:player,sort=nearest,limit=1] satsu.iron.man.choose_armor
execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,sort=nearest,limit=1,distance=0..1.8] run scoreboard players operation @s grave.ID = @e[type=minecraft:player,sort=nearest,limit=1] grave.ID
